N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2405.3 - Procedures

State Regulations

Written notice of demand shall be served on the student or
institution indicating the amount owed, reasons owed and method of recovery. The student or institution has 15 days to serve a written response on the
corporation indicating agreement with the notice of demand or that it is being
disputed and the grounds therefore. If the notice of demand is disputed, the
student or institution may submit documentation with the response supporting
his claim. The corporation shall act on a claim disputing a notice of demand
within 20 days of service of a response and accompanying documentation. With
respect to students such action by the corporation shall be considered final
agency action. If circumstances warrant, within the judgment of the president, a hearing may be provided by the corporation to an institution, upon its
request, with respect to such action, pursuant to the provisions of Part 2403
of this Title. In no event shall a demand for a refund be waived or the amount
demanded reduced by the corporation without the approval of the Comptroller of
the State of New York. Notes
